summary: P5 cosmetic refactoring validation complete. All renamed routes, variables, and file names working correctly. Backend route /private-catalog changed to /sysbook-catalog (confirmed old route returns 404). Frontend prop privateCatalogAccess renamed to sysbookAccess. Tab label shows 'Inventory' not 'Catalog'. API response field catalog_counts renamed to inventory_counts.

issues: Minor warning: 'Cannot update a component while rendering a different component (BrowserRouter AdminLogin AdminLogin)' - non-blocking React warning

passed_tests: Backend: Admin login works with teck@koh.one / Acdb##0897
Backend: GET /api/store/sysbook-catalog/access returns has_access=true and 2 students
Backend: GET /api/store/private-catalog/access returns 404 (confirming old route removed)
Frontend: Admin panel shows Unatienda Summary (School Textbooks: 25, Public Products: 2)
Frontend: Unatienda module tab group shows 'INVENTORY' label (renamed from CATALOG)
Frontend: Unatienda 'Public Store' tab loads 2 products
Frontend: Unatienda 'Stock Mov.' tab loads correctly
Frontend: SYSBOOK sidebar shows Dashboard, Inventory, Stock Movements (renamed correctly)
Frontend: Sysbook Inventory page loads with 25 textbooks
Frontend: Stock Movements page loads with Shipment/Return/Adjustment buttons
critical_code_review_comments: Route rename /private-catalog → /sysbook-catalog complete in sysbook_catalog.py (router prefix line 13)
Import updated in store/routes/__init__.py (line 20): from .sysbook_catalog import router
Response field catalog_counts → inventory_counts in stock_orders.py (lines 217-225)
Prop privateCatalogAccess → sysbookAccess in Unatienda.jsx (line 63), SchoolTextbooksView.jsx, TextbookOrderView.jsx
API URL updated from /private-catalog to /sysbook-catalog in Unatienda.jsx (line 144), PrivateBookDetail.jsx (lines 59-60), BooksByStudent.jsx (lines 56-57, 79)

success_rate.backend: 100% (6/6 API tests passed, 3 skipped due to fixture)

seed_data_creation: No new seed data created - using existing 25 textbooks and 2 public products
context_for_next_testing_agent: P5 cosmetic refactoring verified complete. Key changes: 1) Backend route /api/store/private-catalog → /api/store/sysbook-catalog 2) Frontend prop privateCatalogAccess → sysbookAccess 3) File PublicCatalogTab.jsx → PublicInventoryTab.jsx 4) API response field catalog_counts → inventory_counts 5) Tab group label 'Catalog' → 'Inventory'. All renames verified working in UI and API. 25 textbooks with is_sysbook=True. 2 public store products. Admin login uses email/password fields.
